It runs concurrently with [[Fallen Tears]] and [[Hidden Tears]].

==Steps==
# Go to the Eclipse Tribe at [[Dadaupa Gorge]]
# Open the chest to obtain Dvalin's Tear
#* The [[Precious Chest]] is located on the tower at the far end of the Eclipse Tribe's camp to obtain a [[Teardrop Crystal (Stolen Tears)|Teardrop Crystal]]. The enemies in front of the tower can be bypassed by circling around the southern cliffs and gliding over to the chest.

==Dialogue==
{{Quest Description|The corrupted dragon tear has even attracted hilichurls. You must get it back from them.}}
